report.title: Locations list for user
report.description: List of locations associated with a user via a location attribute holding cms_user_id.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id = l.id AND lw.deleted = false JOIN location_attribute_values lav on lav.location_id = l.id and lav.deleted = false #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND lav.location_attribute_id = #cms_user_attr_id# AND lav.text_value = #cms_user_id# AND #website_filter# #order_by#

param.name: cms_user_attr_id
param.description: ID of location attribute holding CMS user.

param.name: location_type_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of location type ids we want to return results for.
